features: 24-fluid ounce bottle of Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Fragrance-Free Daily Moisturizing Lotion with Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 for extra-dry skin
Specially designed for extra-dry skin to help hydrate, replenish, and strengthen skin's moisture barrier. Is clinically shown to moisturize for 24 hours
Formulated with vitamins E and Pro-Vitamin B5 plus lipids, this moisturizing lotion replenishes to help strengthen your skin's moisture barrier
Moisturizing lotion transforms dry skin into healthy looking, more resilient skin
Fragrance-free lotion formula is non-greasy with a clean, comfortable feel. From Lubriderm, a dermatologist-developed brand
body.description: Product Description Lubriderm Advanced Therapy Fragrance-Free Daily Moisturizing Lotion helps relieve extra-dry skin. From a dermatologist-developed brand, this moisturizing lotion is clinically shown to help moisturize for 24 hours, and transform dry skin into healthy-looking, more resilient skin. Formulated with vitamins E and Pro-Vitamin B5 plus lipids, this fragrance-free lotion replenishes and strengthens your skin's moisture barrier. Plus, its formula is non-greasy with a clean, comfortable feel. From the Manufacturer We believe everyone deserves to have healthy, comfortable skin. Lubriderm, the brand developed by dermatologists, offers specialized formulations with essential nutrients naturally found in healthy skin. Lubriderm advanced therapy deeply hydrates extradry skin. Advanced therapy moisturizing lotion is our solution for your extradry skin and will leave your skin soothed and deeply moisturized. This nongreasy formula, which contains vitamins e & b5 and skin essential lipids naturally found in healthy skin, replenishes and strengthens your skin's moisture barrier. Clinically shown to moisturize extradry skin for 24 hours, and transform extradry skin into healthierlooking, resilient skin in just one week. Smooth on hands And body every day.

Enriched with vitamin E and B5, this advanced therapy lotion is specially formulated to relieve extra dry skin and help transform extra dry skin into healthier looking skin in just one week Will this lotion feel greasy on my skin? No, this lightweight, fast-absorbing advanced therapy lotion with vitamins E & B5 moisturizes for 24 hours while leaving a clean, non-greasy feel

reviews.reviewText: This is a correction to a previous review of a different version of Lubriderm. This is a 5 star--has Vit. B and E, and no allergins like oat as other moisturizers have which is not tolerated by the glutin intolerant. This is extremely helpful for sensitive, dry, skins, and is well absorbed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product at a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: My husband is bedridden and needs his skin moisturized regularly. I really like the consistency. It is rich but not greasy and no noticeable scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best of the drug store lotions.
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best drug store lotions I have bought. It is richer than most lotions, yet not sticky and with very little scent. Since we're washing our hands all the time now, we have it all around the house, and it keeps our hands from getting dry. A very good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Lubriderm for several decades because it’s the best! NOT greasy nor oily. Lubriderm is very moisturising and nurtures the skin!
Smooth and get immediate relief from my dry hands.
Good! Absorbed fast on to your skin without feeling any sticky 👍👍
